thread.title: Luke Bryan and Dierks Bentley Will Once Again Co-Host ACM Awards
thread.title_full: Luke Bryan and Dierks Bentley Will Once Again Co-Host ACM Awards

author: Leanne Aguilera
title: Luke Bryan and Dierks Bentley Will Once Again Co-Host ACM Awards
text: Luke Bryan and Dierks Bentley Will Once Again Co-Host ACM Awards by Leanne Aguilera 5:35   Photo: Getty Images The boys are back! Country superstars Luke Bryan and Dierks Bentley are set to reprise their roles as co-hosts for the 52nd Academy of Country Music Awards. The news of Bryan and Bentley's return to the ACM Awards was announced in a promo during Sunday night's broadcast of the 59th Annual Grammy Awards. MORE: Dierks Bentley Replaces Blake Shelton as Luke Bryan's 2016 ACM Awards Co-Host This isnâ€™t the first time the country twosome have taken center stage at "country music's party of the year." Last year, Bentley was asked to be Bryan's new ACM Awards partner in crime after Blake Shelton stepped down from his usual co-hosting duties. The ACM Awards, which will honor and showcase the biggest names and emerging talent in country music, will broadcast live from T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas on Sunday, April at 8 p.m. ET/PT. Desperate for more Bryan and Bentley goodness? Press play on the video below to watch their adorable co-host announcement from last year's ACM Awards!
